section.name: Release Checklist
section.p: Quick notes on how to prepare a new release of ChenilleKit.

subsection.name: Preparation
subsection.p: Make sure (sure!) you have the latest copies of the ChenilleKit project and all its modules. Update all poms with the new release number.

subsection.name: Commit Changes
subsection.p: Commit all changes into the trunk.

subsection.name: Build site and packages
subsection.p:
login www.chenillekit.org and call the shell script ./bin/chekit_rollout
the following steps will be done after a while:

ol.li: checkout - checkout the latest trunk from google code repository
maven_install - install all project modules into the local maven repository
maven_package_deploy - deploy all maven modules into the public maven repository
maven_site_deploy - deploy the generated project site

ul.li: Upload the binary packages and describe the download link.

subsection.name: Make Marketing
subsection.p: inform in chenillekit-/tapestry-user groups for new release
